name: Martinian
troparia: (Tone 8) You quenched the flames of passion, blessed one, with abundant tears; * you calmed the waves of the sea and checked the assaults of wild beasts, saying:* Most blessed are You, almighty God, for You have saved me from the flame and storm!
kontakia: (Tone 2) Let us praise the ever-blessed Martinian with hymns:* The holy and practiced ascetic!* He trod on the serpent and was the earnest defender of truth,* the courageous dweller of the desert!
